About Me

Hello! I'm John Paul, a passionate programmer and technology enthusiast currently pursuing my studies in Computer Engineering. I have a strong foundation in programming languages and am always eager to expand my skill set through various online courses and practical projects. My dedication to continuous learning is reflected in my achievements, including a certificate from Udemy and several badges from Cisco Networking Academy (NetAcad).

Internship Overview

During my internship at Unified Internship Program Incorporated, I worked as an intern in the Web Development Team, contributing to various web development projects. The company, operating remotely due to its online internship program, provided an excellent environment for learning and professional growth. My internship spanned from October 18, 2024, to November 28, 2024, totaling 300 hours, exceeding the 240 hours required by my school, the Technological Institute of the Philippines, Manila. As part of the team, I played a key role in developing software solutions, managing tasks, and ensuring project deadlines were met effectively. My responsibilities included conducting team meetings through virtual platforms, coding website functionalities using Laravel and Tailwind CSS, performing system testing, and collaborating with team members to address challenges and deliver quality outputs.

Weekly Internship Highlights

Each week of my internship brought new opportunities to learn and grow. In the first week, I participated in an orientation session and started working on a portfolio task using Tailwind CSS. The second week focused on studying Laravel for backend functionalities and planning for our main project. By the third week, I collaborated with my team to start coding the project's foundational features and set up a productive workflow. The fourth and fifth weeks involved developing CRUD functionalities in Laravel and refining the UI/UX design of our project. In the sixth week, my team completed the final stages of the project, including testing and debugging, to ensure it met quality standards. Finally, during the seventh and last week of my internship, I presented our completed project to the supervisor, demonstrating the skills and knowledge I gained during the program.

Internship Main Project

The primary project during my internship involved the development of a Preboarding and Offboarding Web Application, This application aimed to streamline the onboarding and offboarding processes for employees, providing functionalities such as user management, task tracking, and data handling.

Projects Completed

UIP Pre and Offboarding Website

A Preboarding and Offboarding Web Application developed during my internship, designed to streamline onboarding and offboarding processes. The website features functionalities for user management, task tracking, and seamless integration with backend operations. Utilizing Laravel for backend development and Tailwind CSS for the user interface, this project demonstrates expertise in creating responsive and efficient web applications while addressing real-world organizational needs.

Mightea Milktea: Your Personalized Milk Tea Shop with AI Support

A user-friendly e-commerce platform dedicated to milk tea enthusiasts, offering a seamless experience with features such as AI chat support for personalized interaction, OTP registration for secure user sign-ups, and Google Maps integration to streamline the delivery process. This project is part of my Software Design subject, where I focused on integrating modern e-commerce functionalities with a smooth user interface, ensuring both efficiency and user satisfaction.

Automated Door Disinfectant Spray System

An innovative IoT-based security and sanitation solution designed to enhance hygiene and safety in public spaces. This device integrates a disinfectant spray mechanism with a smart locking system, RFID technology, and is powered by an Arduino microcontroller. Additionally, it utilizes Blynk Cloud for real-time SMS notifications, remote monitoring, and control, ensuring that only authorized personnel can access restricted areas. The system’s IoT capabilities allow for seamless integration and real-time updates, enhancing security and efficiency.
